agency.textblock: National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), NOAA, Commerce.

action.textblock: Issuance of modifications to permit Nos. 657 (P77#31), 707 (P77#40) and 711 (P77#43).

summary.textblock: Notice is hereby given that on December 28, 1993, Permit Nos. 657, 707, and 711, issued to the Southwest Fisheries Science Center, NMFS, P.O. Box 271, La Jolla, California, were modified.

address.textblock: The modifications and related documents are available for review upon written request or by appointment in the following office(s):
Permits Division, Office of Protected Resources, NMFS, 1315 East-West Highway, suite 13130, Silver Spring, MD 20910 (301/712-3389);
Director, Southwest Region, NMFS, 501 West Ocean Boulevard, suite 4200, Long Beach, CA 90802, (310/980-4016); and
Marine Mammal Coordinator, Pacific Area Office, NMFS, 2570 Dole Street, room 106, Honolulu, HI 96822 (808/955-8831).

supplem.textblock: The subject modifications have been issued under the authority of the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972, as amended (16 U.S.C. 1351
.), the provisions of §§216.33 (d) and (e) of the Regulations Governing the Taking and Importing of Marine Mammals (50 CFR part 216), the Endangered Species Act of 1973, as amended (16 U.S.C. 1531
.), and the provisions of §222.25 of the regulations governing the taking, importing, and exporting of endangered fish and wildlife (50 CFR part 222).
Permit Nos. 657, 707, and 711 were modified to extend the effective dates through December 31, 1994.

signjob.textblock: Director, Office of Protected Resources, National Marine Fisheries Service.
